member_organisations:
Member organisations are listed here -  
http://londonminingnetwork.org/about/
fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
As part of the EU financed Stop Mad Mining project we engaged on the issue of conflict minerals legislation and the EU Mining Waste Directive.As part of the EU financed Stop Mad Mining project we have engaged on the issue of conflict minerals legislation and the EU Mining Waste Directive 
 
LMN will continue to  advocate on mining issues within the EU  e.g. Mining Waste Directive, Commission activities,  JRC activities on the BAT Ref, Parliament activities. Commission Expert Groups and other Similar Entities (European Commission)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Most of our communication is via our website - http://londonminingnetwork.org
goals__remit: London Mining Network works in support of communities around the world who are badly affected by mining – mining by companies based in, or financed from, London.
